title: How to Make Brengkes Patin Tempoyak

steps.headline: Wash the catfish.
steps.description: Then cut it into 4 pieces, as shown.

steps.headline: Blend the chopped onion and chili until smooth.
Mix the blended onion and chili with the salt, small bowl of tempoyak, a handful of basil leaves, chopped spring onion (scallion), and a small bowl of tamarind liquid.
Add the fish pieces to the mixed ingredients.
steps.description: Marinate the fish pieces for a few minutes, until the seasoning infuses into the fish.

steps.headline: After a few minutes, wrap the fish pieces up in banana leaves.
Serve immediately.
steps.description: Brengkes Patin Tempoyak is ready to serve. Serve with rice and pindang.

text: Wash the catfish. Then cut it into 4 pieces, as shown. Blend the chopped onion and chili until smooth.  Mix the blended onion and chili with the salt, small bowl of tempoyak, a handful of basil leaves, chopped spring onion (scallion), and a small bowl of tamarind liquid. Stir to combine well. Add the fish pieces to the mixed ingredients. Marinate the fish pieces for a few minutes, until the seasoning infuses into the fish. After a few minutes, wrap the fish pieces up in banana leaves.  Steam the fish. Steam it for around 30 minutes. Serve immediately. Brengkes Patin Tempoyak is ready to serve. Serve with rice and pindang.
